title: Implement Lane C ControlEngine Scaffold
description: Implement the Lane C ControlEngine scaffold as designed, including stubbed versions of Moderator, ClaimsChecker, PIIRedactor, and OverrideController. Ensure the module can receive transcript and response metadata, emit policy decision events, and log audit events. Integrate with the event bus and session manager.
acceptance_criteria: Lane C ControlEngine module exists and is instantiable
Moderator, ClaimsChecker, PIIRedactor, and OverrideController are present as stubs
Module receives transcript and response metadata events
Policy decision events are emitted on the event bus
Audit events are logged for policy decisions
